transfer.description: Transfers `amount` of tokens from the caller's account to `recipient`.

approve.description: Allows `spender` to withdraw from the caller's account multiple times, up to the `amount`.

blacklist.description: Adds or removes an address from the blacklist.

burn.description: Burns `value` amount of tokens from the caller's account.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of the caller.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of the caller.

setRule.description: Sets the rules for token transfers and holdings.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to `newOwner`.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the total supply of tokens.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `owner`.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

limited.description: Checks if the token has limited rules.

maxHoldingAmount.description: Returns the maximum amount of tokens that can be held.

minHoldingAmount.description: Returns the minimum amount of tokens that must be held.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

owner.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

uniswapV2Pair.description: Returns the address of the Uniswap V2 pair.
